Based on other reviews and photos, I sized up To a medium which was a mistake. This crop top Is a boxy full length sweatshirt. While very comfortable, it’s not what I expected at all. Biggest disappointment was the color… “grey green” Is not grey green in any sense, it is entirely green. Im still debating if I should keep and hope a wash or 2 shrinks it to an actual crop top and I can get over the color being totally off, or if I should Return and buy size small in different color. from Other pictures , it seems like different colors fit differently. Not sure if my photos capture how GREEN this actually is with zero hint of grey , or how Huge/ boxy it is, but if you’re considering this… dont size up! Get your size or smaller and carefully consider color based on reviews and photos !
After washing this product on casual, it peels so incredibly bad! Horrible horrible quality. Would love my money back cause I’m never wearing this thing again

评论概述: Beware - Clearly Returned and Resold Despite Damage
评论详情: This sweatshirt came to me covered in dog hair, smelled like cigarette smoke, and has purple paint or glue or something splashed all over it. Disgusting. It’s impossible to miss this yet they just repackaged it and resold it without caring. Also it’s extremely cropped, not as described.

One was white and arrived exactly as pictured. The gray one was not at all as pictured. It was a completely different sweatshirt. It looked like someone had cut it right before shipping it. I kept it but I hate the way it fits. It was cut too short and it pulls up. It was a no for me. The white one that I ordered and was expecting was very cute. I love the way it fits.

True to size. So soft and warm. I love that there are no seams inside the shirt. Only downside is the itchy material tag on the side. That tag has always bugged me though.  I removed mine with scissors just fine.
